${ModID}:DroneSwarmRareSkill.NAME: Drone Swarm
${ModID}:DroneSwarmRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Raise your hand size 本回合 by !${ModID}:m2!. NL 抽 !M! 张牌。

${ModID}:TheSuckamidRareSkill.NAME: The Suckamid
${ModID}:TheSuckamidRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! 生命。 NL Retain your hand for !${ModID}:m2! turns. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:TheSuckamidRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! 生命。 NL Retain your hand for !${ModID}:m2! turns. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:ElectromagneticBurstRarePower.NAME: Electromagnetic Burst
${ModID}:ElectromagneticBurstRarePower.DESCRIPTION: 每当 you 获得 格挡, deal !M! damage to a random enemy。

${ModID}:ArrowStormRareAttack.NAME: Arrow Storm
${ModID}:ArrowStormRareAttack.DESCRIPTION: 消耗 all Attack cards in your hand. NL If you 消耗ed 一张牌, 造成 !D! 点伤害 to ALL enemies !M! times。

${ModID}:MarvelousFeastUncommonPower.NAME: Marvelous Feast
${ModID}:MarvelousFeastUncommonPower.DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 Add in order: ${ModID}:Croquettes that provide 格挡, Weak, 力量 and Vulnerable to your hand. Once per turn ended。
${ModID}:MarvelousFeastUncommonPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 Add in order, upgraded: ${ModID}:Croquettes that provide 格挡, Weak, 力量 and Vulnerable to your hand. Once per turn ended。

${ModID}:MeatyCroquettesSpecialColourles.NAME: Meaty Croquettes
${ModID}:MeatyCroquettesSpecialColourles.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Croquette. NL 获得 !M! 点 力量 。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:FishyCroquettesSpecialColourles.NAME: Fishy Croquettes
${ModID}:FishyCroquettesSpecialColourles.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Croquette. NL 给予 !M! 层 虚弱 。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:FriendshipCroquettesSpecialColo.NAME: Friendship Croquettes
${ModID}:FriendshipCroquettesSpecialColo.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Croquette. NL 获得 !B! 格挡, 消耗 。 NL When Retained, increase its 格挡 by !M! 本场战斗。

${ModID}:MysteryCroquettesSpecialColourl.NAME: Mystery Croquettes
${ModID}:MysteryCroquettesSpecialColourl.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Croquette. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:TopOfTheSkyUncommonAttack.NAME: Top of the Sky
${ModID}:TopOfTheSkyUncommonAttack.DESCRIPTION: 保留 。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Returns to your hand on play. 消耗ive !stslib:ex!。

${ModID}:BucketOfDregsUncommonSkill.NAME: Bucket Of Dregs
${ModID}:BucketOfDregsUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. 保留 。 NL When Retained, heal ALL enemies for !M! 生命 and 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。

${ModID}:PocketTournamentUncommonSkill.NAME: Pocket Tournament
${ModID}:PocketTournamentUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, randomly, 2X times: NL Draw 1 card, 获得 [E] , 获得 1 力量 or 获得 3 格挡 。 NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:PocketTournamentUncommonSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, randomly, 2X+2 times: NL Draw 1 card, 获得 [E] , 获得 1 力量 or 获得 3 格挡 。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:StoneSwordCommonAttack.NAME: Stone Sword
${ModID}:StoneSwordCommonAttack.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 获得 !M! Dexterity. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Rea__dyCommonSkill.NAME: Rea--dy!
${ModID}:Rea__dyCommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 活力. NL 获得 !${ModID}:m2! Temporary Dexterity. NL 消耗ive !stslib:ex!。
${ModID}:Rea__dyCommonSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 活力. NL 获得 !${ModID}:m2! Temporary Dexterity. NL Draw 1 card. NL 消耗ive !stslib:ex!。
